title: vArAdO karuNai
sahitya:
vArAdO karuNai kaNNA inda malai aruvaip-pOlE cala cala ena ODi 


anupallavi

  nArAyaNA Om enrE tAraka nAmattai nambi japittiDum anbar manamaghizha


caraNam    aruNa malaraik-konjum Anandat-tenral pOl Ayar pullAnkuzhalil pAyum isai nayam pOl
kiraNa ravi naghaikkum kizhikkoLi pOlavE kiLirndu taLirnden uLLam kuLirndu niraindiDavE
